metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5261 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The graph settings script (graph_settings.php) in Cacti 0.8.8b and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a font size, related to the rrdtool commandline in lib/rrd.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5261` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-8').
